name: Dhrumil Shah
summary: My career objective is to leverage my expertise in artificial intelligence and machine learning to contribute to cutting-edge projects that drive innovation and solve complex problems. I aim to learn skills to develop advanced AI models that enhance decision-making processes and automate tasks in various domains. I'm passionate about continuously learning and staying updated with the latest advancements in AI/ML technologies, and I'm eager to collaborate with like-minded professionals to push the boundaries of what's possible in this exciting field. Ultimately, I envision myself playing a key role in driving positive impact for both the organization and society as a whole through the application of AI/ML solutions.

experience.description: Optimized air traffic flow and passenger experience through strategic coordination and resource allocation.

experience.description: Developed an APK using Unity to augment digital versions of products for online shopping.
